scripts.canaryversion: npm version prerelease --preid=precanary && cp .npmrc ./packages/adaptableblotter && cp .npmrc ./packages/adaptableblotter-react-aggrid && cp .npmrc ./packages/adaptableblotter-ng-aggrid
scripts.release:patch: cd packages/adaptableblotter && npm version patch && cd ../../packages/adaptableblotter-react-aggrid && npm version patch && cd ../../packages/adaptableblotter-ng-aggrid && npm version patch && cd ../../ && npm run registry-publish
scripts.release:minor: cd packages/adaptableblotter && npm version minor && cd ../../packages/adaptableblotter-react-aggrid && npm version minor && cd ../../packages/adaptableblotter-ng-aggrid && npm version minor && cd ../../ && npm run registry-publish
scripts.release:major: cd packages/adaptableblotter && npm version major && cd ../../packages/adaptableblotter-react-aggrid && npm version major && cd ../../packages/adaptableblotter-ng-aggrid && npm version major && cd ../../ && npm run registry-publish
scripts.registry-publish: npm run --prefix packages/adaptableblotter registry-publish && npm run --prefix packages/adaptableblotter-react-aggrid registry-publish && npm run --prefix packages/adaptableblotter-ng-aggrid registry-publish
scripts.registry-publish-canary: cd packages/adaptableblotter && npm run registry-publish-canary && cd ../../packages/adaptableblotter-react-aggrid && npm run registry-publish-canary
scripts.install-core: npm install --prefix packages/adaptableblotter && npm run --prefix packages/adaptableblotter rm-native-types
scripts.build: npm run tsc-core && npm run build-core && npm run build-react && npm run build-angular
scripts.tsc: npm run tsc-core && npm run tsc-react && npm run tsc-angular
